Uses of Package
se.sics.saml

Packages that use se.sics.saml
se.sics.saml   
 

Classes in se.sics.saml used by se.sics.saml
SAMLAttribute
          A SAML attribute as defined in section 2.7.3.1 of the SAML 2.0 standard.
SAMLAttributeStatement
          This represents a SAML AttributeStatement (see section 2.7.3 of the SAML 2.0 of standard).
SAMLAttributeValue
          Implements the SAML attribute value according to section 2.7.3.1.1 of the SAML 2.0 standard.
SAMLCondition
          This is the abstract superclass for SAML conditions as defined in section 2.5 of the SAML 2.0 specification.
SAMLConditions
          Conditions element as defined in section 2.5 of the SAML 2.0 standard
SAMLID
          An interface that represents the 3 different SAML IDs BaseID, NameID and EncryptedID.
SAMLNameID
          Implements the SAML NameID element.
SAMLSigner
          Signs SAML assertions.
SAMLStatement
          An interface that defines that an object can encode itself into SAML form.
SAMLSubject
          A class to encode SAML subjects according to the definition in section 2.4.1 of the SAML 2.0 standard.
SAMLSubjectConfirmation
          SAML SubjectConfirmations.
SAMLSubjectConfirmationData
          SubjectConfirmationData according to section 2.4.1.2 of the SAML 2.0 standard with no additional data.
SignedSAMLAssertion
          A signed SAML assertion.
VerificationException
          An exception that represents a failure to verify SAML control data.
